index.reviewStatement: Your account request will be reviewed and you will be notified by email once it has been approved.

details.heading: Request an account
details.introParagraph: You can request an account if you work for a risk management authority or an Environment Agency team. We will use the information you provide to verify your request for an account.
details.eaAreaProgrammeTeamHint: Allows you to view all records created within the boundary of your Area.
details.eaPartnershipStrategicOverviewTeam: Environment Agency – Partnership & Strategic Overview Team
details.eaPartnershipStrategicOverviewTeamHint: Allows you to view and edit all records created within the boundary of your team
details.riskManagementAuthorityHint: Allows you to create, edit, and view all records created within the boundary of your RMA.
details.privacyPolicyIntro: Details of our Personal Information Charter can be found at
details.dataCollectedQuestion: What of my data is being collected and how is it used? What is the legal basis for the processing?
details.dataCollectedBullet1: Verify that you are eligible for an account
details.dataCollectedBullet2: Ensure your account is set up with the correct access permissions
details.dataCollectedBullet3: Allow us to contact you if your request is unclear
details.dataCollectedBullet4: Your contact details will be used to manage your proposal, including contacting you with queries and updates
details.dataCollectedStatement: Processing is necessary for the performance of a task carried out in the public interest or in the exercise of official authority vested in the data controller to enable Risk Management Authorities to bid for central government Grant in Aid funding.
details.dataSharedQuestion: Who will my data be shared with?
details.dataSharedAnswer: Your personal data will not be shared or disclosed to any other party outside the Environment Agency without your explicit consent.
details.dataTransferredQuestion: Will my data be transferred outside of the EEA? If it will, how will it be protected?
details.dataTransferredAnswer: The data you provide will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area.
details.dataHeldQuestion: How long will my data be held for?
details.dataHeldAnswer: Your personal data will be kept by us for as long as you require access to the service
details.automatedDecisionMakingQuestion: Will my data be used for automated decision-making or profiling?
details.automatedDecisionMakingAnswer: The information you provide is not connected with individual decision making (making a decision solely by automated means without any human involvement) or profiling (automated processing of personal data to evaluate certain things about an individual).

checkAnswers.confirmationText: By submitting this request you are confirming that, to the best of your knowledge, the details you are providing are correct.

confirmation.panelBody: Your account request is being reviewed
confirmation.whatHappensNextPara1: Your account request has been submitted for review by an administrator.
confirmation.whatHappensNextPara2: Once your account has been approved, you will receive an email with a link to set your account password and start using the service.
confirmation.insetBoxText: Account approval usually takes 1-2 working days. You will be notified by email once your account has been reviewed.
confirmation.bullet1: Wait for the approval email from the administrator
confirmation.bullet2: Check your spam folder if you do not receive an email within 2 working days
confirmation.bullet3: Once approved, use the link in the email to set your password
